about_the_game:
Get back to the golden age of the 90's JRPGs with a modern touch! With this pack, you'll get 12 tracks inspired from the soundtracks of games such as Chrono Trigger, Breath of Fire or Final Fantasy!

Features:

* Battle and boss battle tracks
* City track
* Emotional tracks
* Dungeon tracks
* Victory track
* Field tracks
* WAV, OGG and M4A formats included
* 12 Royalty free music tracks for use with RPG Maker MV

Tracklist:

Victory 1
Scene 1-3
Field 1-2
Dungeon 1-3
City 1
Boss 1
Battle 1
